xml.data:
Home » 39P3 Dhammānuloma (1), Dukatikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (3) » 3 Cūḷantaraduka, Kusalattika » 3.4 Sappaṭighaduka, Kusalattika » 3.4.2 Abyākatapada » 3.4.2.7 Pañhāvāra » Paccayacatukka
Hetu
Cūḷantaraduka, Kusalattika
Sappaṭighaduka, Kusalattika
Abyākatapada
Pañhāvāra
Paccayacatukka
Hetu
30.
1526Appaṭigho abyākato dhammo appaṭighassa abyākatassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. (3) (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
31.
1527Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe dve, adhipatiyā tīṇi, anantare ekaṃ, samanantare ekaṃ, sahajāte nava, aññamaññe cha, nissaye nava, upanissaye dve, purejāte tīṇi, pacchājāte tīṇi, āsevane ekaṃ, kamme tīṇi, vipāke tīṇi, āhāre tīṇi, indriye pañca, jhāne tīṇi, magge tīṇi, sampayutte ekaṃ, vippayutte cattāri, atthiyā nava, natthiyā ekaṃ, vigate ekaṃ, avigate nava.
<< Paccayacatukkaup Paccanīyuddhāra >>
